name: Collective of Plenty
desc: One of the six tribes of Natlan, also known as Teteocan. The tribe's people live alongside the Tatankasaurs.

galleryCharacter.key: A Bountiful Land of Farming and Fecundity

imgDesc.text: The settlement of the tribe who live alongside the Tatankasaurs, known as the "Collective of Plenty." Volcanic ash has bestowed upon them fertile lands whose golden harvests sway in the wind and symbolize the rich bounty that the collective has been blessed with.

customize.text:
Ahpub
The founder of the tribe who first fought alongside the first Pyro Archon,

customize.name: Xbalanque
customize.desc: The first Pyro Archon, who defeated the Flamelord and revived from the flames.

customize.name: Och-Kan
customize.desc: A dragon mixed with a human soul, the ruler of the Cinder City, known as the Python King and Sacred Lord.

customize.name: Wanjiru
customize.desc: One of the six heroes of Natlan who bore the Ancient NameShe died during the Cataclysm 500 years ago.

customize.text: The Pyro Archon, Mavuika's, friend and the hero of the tribe, who joined Tenoch and went to the future Mare Jivari 500 years ago during the

customize.name: Khaenri'ahn cataclysm
customize.desc: A disaster that occurred 500 years ago. The Abyss was released into Teyvat and Khaenri'ah was destroyed.

customize.text:
.
Fietena
A masked hero and Wanjiru's disciple who lived about 500 years ago.
Copan
Head of the Saurian Relic Association who went to

customize.name: Ochkanatlan
customize.desc: In order to pursue the great dream in the morning mist and sea of clouds, the warriors who soared the skies never rested for a moment.

customize.text: about 490 years ago in the search for the Jade of Return.

customize.name: Iansan
customize.desc: Head coach of the fitness club at the Collective of Plenty, and a renowned Natlanese nutritionist.

customize.text: Fitness trainer. She is a hero of the Collective of Plenty, who has been acknowledged by her Ancient Name.

customize.name: Varesa
customize.desc: A laid-back orchard manager and warrior of the Collective of Plenty. An aspiring hero who hungers for justice... and lots and lots of food!

customize.text: Stalwart warrior and orchard owner from the Collective of Plenty.

customize.name: Tatankasaur Whelp
customize.desc:
A young Tatankasaurus that has not yet mastered full control of its powerful frame, leaving its movements clumsy.
Its second set of horns are still growing out, and its back and snout are not quite strong enough to smash through rocks that block the road. Given the time to grow, it will one day be able to roam freely across the fertile plains.

customize.name: Tatankasaurus
customize.desc:
A saurian with a hard, bony crest and a powerful body suited to dashing around volcanic landscapes.
According to legend, the Tatankasaurus's ancestors were so large they could use their horns to move mountains, but they lacked the agility of their smaller, modern relatives. Perhaps the great power that Tatankasaurs still possess is a gift passed down through their bloodline.

customize.text:
Tribal companions
Volcano Lord
A huge, hulking monster, with a body like a salamander, with a black and purple body. He seized power after his ancestor, Dragon Sovereign Xiuhcoatl, died.

customize.name: Atocpan
customize.desc: Beneath the frequent eruptions of volcanic flames, the warriors of the Collective of Plenty who thrive on fertile lands meet their trials head-on with raw strength.

customize.name: Ring of Yaxche
customize.desc: This jade vessel was created by a hero of yesteryear. Legend has it that it once shot the giant dragon that dwelt in the volcano down from the skies.

customize.name: Sturdy Bone
customize.desc: A longsword made of bone that has only grown harder after being hit and swung countless times. It is said that this was the hero Wanjiru's reliable weapon.

customize.name: Vivid Notions
customize.desc: A trophy made from gemstones from the Collective of Plenty and crystals from the Flower-Feather Clan. It is said to have once belonged to a legendary wrestler.

customize.name: Scroll of the Hero of Cinder City
Sunset-Blue Obsidian Fragment
customize.desc: An obsidian fragment with engraved patterns styled like those of the Collective of Plenty, which you obtained by chance while exploring. It appears that you could form a full ring using three of them, though what that will achieve, you cannot tell.

customize.name: Sunset-Blue Obsidian Ring
customize.desc: An obsidian ring with engraved patterns styled like those of the Collective of Plenty. It is an ancient medium by which the tribe established contact with the deep night. Perhaps its strength can allow you to cross the boundary between this place and a certain other location...

customize.name: "Collective of Plenty" Reputation EXP
customize.desc: Increases your Tribe Reputation Lv. (Collective of Plenty)

customize.name: Harvest's Boon
customize.desc: A rich and comforting meal held together by the humble Grainfruit. Minced meat is stir-fried and placed in a baking pan with larger chunks of meat and eggs. The whole thing is then covered with a layer of mashed Grainfruit and baked until a tantalizing golden brown. This hearty dish can often be found on the tables of the Collective of Plenty during harvest festivals.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>March 14, 2025</color>
The members of the Collective of Plenty are brimming with passion for sports and running.
It feels as though every inch of land and every corner, bears the trace of both saurians and humans alike, who once dashed by in a blur of speed.
